justification: The paper describes using three adjectives – 'bored,' 'dull,' and 'monotonous' – from the Epistemically-Related Emotion Scales (EES) to assess pandemic boredom.

The study administered the Boredom Proneness Scale-Short Form (Struk et al., 2017), which is noted as a short questionnaire used to investigate trait boredom. The 8 items measure boredom proneness effectively.
